resources.string: In the main page, the crane is controlled automatically. When you pick a color the crane will look for the cube in that color and pick it up.
In the first page you will see a list of all the devices your phone is paired with. In order to proceed, pick crane.

In the manual control page, you can control the crane on your own. The up and down buttons will lift and lower the claw, and the right and left buttons move the crane on the track. You can also scan a color and the crane will tell you witch cube is in front of him(if present).
"Due to lack of sensors, your'e gonna need to help the claw a bit. Before you start a color search, make sure the claw height is in the correct position, as seen in the picture."
Hello, and welcome to my project! In the first page of my project there are the basics buttons required. The exit button will close the app, about contain my information, and start will open my app.
